mapper.select:
WITH SUB AS (SELECT T1.RCARD, T1.mcard, t1.MITEMCODE, T3.VENDORCODE, T4.MATERIALTYPECLASS AS "TYPE", T2.MOCODE, T2.PalletCode, to_char(to_date(T2.mdate || lpad(T2.mtime, 6, 0),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') as PalletTime, REGEXP_SUBSTR(t3.mname,'[a-zA-Z0-9_-]+',1,1,'i') as mname FROM TBLONWIPITEM T1, TBLPALLET2RCARD T2, TBLMATERIAL T3, TBLOPBOMDETAIL T4 WHERE T1.RCARD = T2.RCARD AND T1.MITEMCODE = T3.MCODE AND T1.MITEMCODE = T4.OBITEMCODE
AND T2.Palletcode =#{palletCode} ), SUB2 as ( select T2.RCARD, T1.mcard, t1.MITEMCODE, T3.VENDORCODE, T4.MATERIALTYPECLASS "TYPE", T2.MOCODE, T2.PalletCode, T2.PalletTime, T2.mname from TBLONWIPITEM t1, SUB t2, TBLMATERIAL t3, TBLOPBOMDETAIL t4 where t1.rcard = t2.mcard AND T1.MITEMCODE = T3.MCODE AND T1.MITEMCODE = T4.OBITEMCODE ),keyparts as (SELECT RCARD, MIN(Palletcode) as Palletcode , MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'TP' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS TP, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'BATTERY' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS BATTERY, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'BATTERY' THEN vendorcode ELSE '' END) AS BatterySupplier, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'FRONTCAMERA' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS FrontCamera, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'FRONTCAMERA' THEN vendorcode ELSE '' END) AS FrontCameraSupplier, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'BACKCAMERA' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS BackCamera, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'BACKCAMERA' THEN vendorcode ELSE '' END) AS BackCameraSupplier, min(mname) mname, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'FAN' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS FAN, MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'OBD' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS OBD
,MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'BATTERY COVER' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS BATTERYCOVER ,MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'FRONT CASE' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS FRONTCASE ,MIN(CASE TYPE WHEN 'PLATELET' THEN MCARD ELSE '' END) AS PLATELET FROM SUB2 GROUP BY RCARD), keyparttime as (select t1.rcard, MAX(case opcode when 'IMEI' then to_char(to_date(t1.mdate || lpad(t1.mtime, 6, 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') else '' end) as IMEIWriteTime, MAX(case opcode when 'LABELPRINT' then to_char(to_date(t1.mdate || lpad(t1.mtime, 6, 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') else '' end) as BoxTime, MAX(case opcode when 'PACKING' then to_char(to_date(t1.mdate || lpad(t1.mtime, 6, 0), 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') else '' end) as PackTime, MAX(case opcode when 'CHECKVER' then to_char(to_date(t1.mdate || lpad(t1.mtime, 6, 0),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'),'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') else '' end) as EncryptTime from tblonwip t1, sub t2 where t1.MOCODE = t2.mocode and t1.rcard = t2.rcard group by t1.rcard), keypartweight as (select w.rcard, max(w.weight) as weight from tblrcard2weight w, sub s where w.rcard = s.rcard group by w.rcard) ,keypartData as ( select K1.RCARD, K1.PalletCode, K1.TP, K1.BATTERY, K1.BatterySupplier, K1.FrontCamera, K1.FrontCameraSupplier, K1.BackCamera, K1.BackCameraSupplier, K2.weight, K3.IMEIWriteTime, K3.BoxTime, K3.PackTime, K3.EncryptTime, k1.mname, K1.FAN, K1.OBD, K1.BATTERYCOVER, K1.FRONTCASE, K1.PLATELET from keyparts k1, keypartweight k2, keyparttime k3 where k1.rcard = k2.rcard and k1.rcard = k3.rcard ) select *
from (select t.*, rownum rn
from (select t1.mname AS PROJECT, substr(t3.mocode, 1, instr( t3.mocode, '-') -1) as "ORDER", t1.RCARD, t1.PalletCode, t1.TP, t1.BATTERY, nvl((select vendorname from TBLVendor where vendorcode=t1.BatterySupplier),'') BatterySupplier, t1.FrontCamera, nvl((select vendorname from TBLVendor where vendorcode=t1.FrontCameraSupplier),'') FrontCameraSupplier, t1.BackCamera, nvl((select vendorname from TBLVendor where vendorcode=t1.BackCameraSupplier),'') BackCameraSupplier, t1.weight, t1.IMEIWriteTime, t1.BoxTime, t1.PackTime, t1.EncryptTime, t2.IMEI1, t2.IMEI2, t2.MEID, t2.sn as PcbSN, t2.id1 as BT, t2.id2 as WIFI, t2.psn as MSN, t2.netcode as Netcode, t2.id4 as COLORID, t2.id3 as SoftVer, T3.COLORID AS COLOR,
T3.MIUINUM AS FLASH, T3.DEVICE MODEL,
T3.USERDATAVERSION AS PARTNO,
T3.PLATFORM AS EanCODE,
T3.shipcountry as Destination, T4.cartonno as BoxNo, '' AS SUID, '' AS Screen, '' as SecretKey, '' as EmmcSupplier, '' as PRENO, t2.id5, t2.id6, t2.tsn, t1.FAN, t1.OBD ,t1.BATTERYCOVER ,t1.FRONTCASE ,t1.PLATELET from keypartdata t1, tblmo2imei t2 ,tblmo t3,tblcarton2rcard t4 where t1.rcard = t2.tsn and t2.mocode = t3.mocode and t1.rcard = t4.rcard ) t where rownum <= (${offset}+${limit})) where rn > ${offset}
